name: Medieval Clothes
description:
Enjoy Medieval Clothing for Men and Women.
Wear different clothes for every activity.
The Armors was designed to perfectly fit the Seraph's contours.
I want to give a special thanks to MisterAndyDandy and SpearAndFang for their help and support at all times.

WARNING: The Clothing and Armor in this mod are not compatible with Vanilla Clothing and Armor, as it uses exclusive models.

Enjoy!
.
